text: SPR Stal Mielec is a men's handball club from Mielec, Poland, that plays in the Superliga. ==Titles== * Superliga: ** 16px 2nd: 1975 ** 16px 3rd: 2012 *Cup of Poland : ** 16px 1st: 1971 Hala sportowo-widowiskowa MOSiR ==Team== ===Current squad=== :Squad for the 2020–21 season ;Goalkeepers * 12 Goran Anđelić * 22 Tomasz Wiśniewski * 99 Krystian Witkowski ;Left Wingers * 24 Michał Chodara * 94 Rafał Krupa ;Right Wingers *2 Paweł Wilk *4 Łukasz Janyst ;Line players * 34 Kosta Petrović * 44 Dzianis Krytski ;Left Backs * 17 Łukasz Nowak * 30 Jakub Olszewski * 66 Miljan Ivanović ;Centre Backs * 10 Hubert Kornecki * 18 Dzianis Valyntsau * 25 Marek Monczka * 71 Michał Kozioł ;Right Backs *5 Ramon Oliveira *8 Tomasz Mochocki * 51 Bartosz Wojdak ===Transfers=== :Transfers for the 2020–21 season ;Joining * Marek Monczka (CB) (from HCB Karviná) * Ramon Oliveira (RB) (from Wybrzeże Gdańsk) * Dzianis Krytski (P) (from Energa MKS Kalisz) * Kosta Petrović (P) (from SKKP Handball Brno) ;Leaving * Wiktor Jędrzejewski (P) (to KSZO Odlewnia Ostrowiec Świętokrzyski) * Piotr Krępa (P) (to Energa MKS Kalisz) ==References== ==External links== *Official page Category:Polish handball clubs Category:Mielec Category:Handball clubs established in 1952 Category:1952 establishments in Poland
title: SPR Stal Mielec
